original_text: He said, ‘Aaron will soon die. He will not go in to the land that I am giving to the Israelites. That is because you both refused to obey me at Meribah.
korean_text: 아론은 그 조상들에게로 돌아가고 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 준 땅에는 들어가지 못하리니 이는 너희가 므리바 물에서 내 말을 거역한 까닭이니라

sentences.original_text: He will not go in to the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 땅에 들어가지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I am giving to the Israelites
That is because you both refused
